info.name: tRCMB - fullscreen browsing, v2.4
info.description:
v2.4 - non douchebag version
Modified per the new "2.0" 247 nonsense.

Just keeping up with the overlords.  They're persistent bastards... which would be fine if they accomplished anything.
info.additionalInfo:
v2.2
Credit Heat Mister for the new fixes:

Grey background.
Includes avatars.
Corrects Firefox message width bug (84% vs 85%) that was causing messages to wind up below the user info instead of next to it.
